title: Romantic Mount Dandenong Summit Retreat with Welcome Breakfast Hamper
description: There’s something magical about Mount Dandenong, and this cosy summit stay - just 60 minutes from Melbourne - offers the perfect romantic escape. You’ll be perfectly positioned to discover the best of the Dandenong Ranges, with SkyHigh Mount Dandenong and Scenic Lookout just around the corner, and Mrs Marple's Tea Rooms and the iconic Puffing Billy both within an easy drive. Two acres of gardens surround the property, and modern self-contained suites and lofts include a fully equipped kitchen, dining space, gas-fuelled fireplace and private balcony - everything you need to kick back and savour the serenity.
offer_address: 10 Observatory Road, Mount Dandenong, Victoria 3767, Australia

title: Romantic Mount Dandenong Summit Retreat with Welcome Breakfast Hamper
description:
There’s something magical about Mount Dandenong, and this cosy summit stay - just 60 minutes from Melbourne - offers the perfect romantic escape amid scenic woodlands. You’ll be well placed to discover the best of the Dandenong Ranges, with SkyHigh Mount Dandenong, Scenic Lookout, Mrs Marple's Tea Rooms and the iconic Puffing Billy all within a 20-minute drive away.

Two acres of gardens surround the property, while modern, self-contained suites and lofts include a fully equipped kitchen, dining space, cosy gas-fuelled fireplace and private balcony - everything you need to kick back and savour the serenity.
offer_address: 10 Observatory Road, Mount Dandenong, Victoria 3767, Australia
